Invitation to Working With Children Taster Session!
Hi {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.Associate__c}, Following on from your recent call, we would like to invite you to a Working With Children Taster session. This is going to be a great opportunity for you to find out exactly what working with children involves. It will give you a real flavour of the things that you could be doing on your year on Step Forward and shouldn't be missed Date: Tuesday 12th May Arrival Time: 5.30pm Please arrive on time. End Time: 8pm. At: The Challenge Offices, Elizabeth House, 39 York Road, Waterloo, SE1 7NQ The nearest train stations are Waterloo and Waterloo East. The nearest tube stations are Waterloo and Southwark. Please wait at the reception and we will collect you. You do not need to bring anything with you, and pizza will be provided. Please let us know if you have specific dietary requirements by emailing step.forward@the-challenge.org. You can sign up for this event by clicking here. There are limited spaces available which will be allocated on a first come first served basis. The deadline to sign up is Tuesday 5th May. We look forward to seeing you on Tuesday 12th May. Thanks!
